name: Whispers: Last Hope
description: Spin-off of Whispers. The protagonist of the previous game was lucky to escape from demons which had been raised by the old man. Will the main character of the present game have that luck? You play as a roadside cafe worker. You are on the night shift and your responsibility is to clean the café.
